changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE project ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, submitter INT NOT NULL REFERENCES "user"(id), title VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, github_url VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, starts_count INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, satus VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'new', created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, edited TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL ); CREATE INDEX idx_project1 ON project (submitter);
